source: Death Toll Soars: 50+ Killed, 400+ Wounded in Las Vegas Shooting. What started as a country music concert turned into a bloody massacre overnight, and it's now being called the worst mass shooting in U.S. history.

At least 50 dead, more than 400 hurt in Las Vegas concert attack. At least 50 people died and more than 400 more hurt when a 64-year-old gunman with an arsenal of at least 10 rifles fired on a Las Vegas country music festival on Sunday, raining down bullets from a 32nd-floor window for minutes before killing himself.
At Least 50 Dead, Hundreds Wounded In Shooting At Las Vegas Country Music Festival. It was the deadliest mass shooting in modern U.S. history.
